EmailTemplate.name: Collegiate Ramblers
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Due to the licensing agreement in place, all collegiate products are sold at full retail price.
Collegiate coolers and tanks can be purchased directly from YETI.
For a full line of customized Rambler products, visit the YETI Custom Shop. This is our official customization service for the Rambler line and it's the only process that's guaranteed to be Built For The Wild. Get started now at yeticustomshop.com or get in touch by emailing them hi@yeticustomshop.com or calling 512.777.1078
Please note that YETI Custom Shop is unable to customize pre-purchased Rambler products. You must order customized product directly from YETI Custom Shop.
{!User.CommunityNickname} Account Management Team YETI 512.394.0222 sales@yeti.com yeti.com
